short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the ?tl=XX parameter from Reddit URLs to show posts in their original language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of Reddit posts being automatically translated into a specific language? With Remove Reddit Automatic Translations, you can enjoy Reddit posts in their original language without any interference. This extension removes the ?tl=XX query parameter from Reddit URLs, ensuring the content remains as intended by the original poster.
Features:

- Automatically cleans Reddit URLs by removing the translation query parameter.
- Works seamlessly in the background without affecting your browsing experience.
- Lightweight, fast, and respects your privacyâ€”no data collection or tracking.

Disclaimer:

This extension is an independent tool created to enhance your browsing experience. We are not affiliated with Reddit, Inc., and do not claim ownership of any copyrights or trademarks associated with Reddit or its services. All rights belong to their respective owners.
Privacy First:

Your privacy matters. This extension operates entirely on your browser and does not transmit any data to external servers.
